summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing evidence collection related to Jeffrey Epstein. The prosecutors are coordinating to identify Amazon order information and shipping addresses associated with Epstein for the purpose of drafting a subpoena.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email chain discusses evidence collection related to him, specifically Amazon orders and shipments sent to his addresses.

events.title: Prosecutors coordinate evidence collection on Epstein
events.description: Assistant United States Attorneys in the SDNY exchange emails to identify Amazon order information and shipping addresses linked to Jeffrey Epstein to draft a subpoena for his entire order history.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Prosecutors from the Southern District of New York were actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein's Amazon order history in June 2019.
Evidence included a FedEx shipment from a '457 Madison Address' sent to Epstein in Palm Beach.
A primary address identified for Epstein was '358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480'.
The prosecutors were preparing to draft a subpoena for Epstein's entire Amazon order history based on evidence from a 'trash pull'.
The correspondence shows investigative focus on Epstein's financial and personal transactions shortly before his July 2019 arrest.
